nodes.text: Grob'thok—known as Grob'thok, Who Feeds the Forge—was a cyborg rancor that was altered by the Dread Masters and put to work in the forges of the Dread Fortress on the moon Oricon. During the Dread War in the Galactic War, Grob'thok was killed by invading forces.
Grob'thok appears as the third boss in the Operation "The Dread Fortress," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.4.
